    • Uses of AffineTransformSourceAndConverterRegistration in ch.epfl.biop.registration.sourceandconverter.affine

      Subclasses of AffineTransformSourceAndConverterRegistration in ch.epfl.biop.registration.sourceandconverter.affine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AffineRegistration
      To make an affine transform programmatically conveniently
      class  AffineTransformedSourceWrapperRegistration
      Fake registration which simply wraps a transform which is used to modify either: - the place of the image in the user GUI, or to TODO : write a bit more clearly what this does
      class  CenterZeroRegistration
      Fake registration : simply centers the image in order to put its center at the origin of the global coordinate system.
      class  Elastix2DAffineRegistration
      Uses Elastix backend to perform an affine transform registration
